attributes.action: Encourage via taxation a financial incentive for commuters to use motorcycles to reduce rsuh hour congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With rush hour congestion becoming a big problem in our cities i petition the Goverment to encourage the use of motorcycles for daily commuting purposes.
Reasons,
1/ Most cars still have a driver only and no passengers in the car.
2/ Public Transport is not easing congestion due to inflexability.
3/ More space on the road would be available due to the size of a motorcycle compared to average car.
4/ Less emmisions, look at the bumber to bumper queueing during rush hour traffic in our cities.
5/ Lessen commuting time making us more efficent.
6/ Less damage to road surface reducing costs.
7/ Less fuel used, environmently better.

HOW ?  Give small motorcyles such a tax advantage/credit it would be irrestable for commuters to consider,

Thank you !!
